entry.title: Announcing the (official) launch of PsiQED
entry.content:
The title pretty much says it all -- I'm finally launching a blog as I segue into the graduate lifestyle and start PhD School in August.

I plan to post on a variety of topics (the only real criterion being things that interests me), but posts will likely cluster around physics, education, technology, and the occasional (software) hack. I also plan to write weekly reviews to summarize and collect my thoughts on the week, however interesting or mundane they might be.

That's about it; stay tuned and check back. We'll see if I can actually keep this up.
